wrong_answers.content:
...WRONG PASSWORD!
You've entered the wrong password, but the door did not open. Try to to remind yourself of those four correct numbers. There is a 4, there is a 2...

...WRONG PASSWORD!
You've entered the wrong password, AGAIN; The door did not open. Use your brain... The answer is in your head, on the tip of your tounge... Suddenly, a memory flashes in your head...
2..2..4........

...WRONG PASSWORD!
You've entered the wrong password! The door did not open.
You can't trust your memory... Your hands start to tremble.
